entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Greenstone (Beardmore)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:42 a.m. EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow mixed with ice pellets early this morning. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Local blowing snow this morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this morning. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High zero.
